front.title: A YANG Data Model for Open Shortest Path First (OSPF) Topology

abstract.t: This document defines a YANG data model for representing an abstracted view of a network topology that contains Open Shortest Path First (OSPF) information. This document augments the 'ietf- network' data model by adding OSPF concepts and explains how the data model can be used to represent the OSPF topology. The YANG data model defined in this document conforms to the Network Management Datastore Architecture (NMDA).
